divs: Sighting Detailswent out to check weather and look at stars as i usually do at approx 245am looked up and noticed section of sky totally dark. don't know what happened next, woke up in bed 12 hrs later? then i noticed marks in patteren on inner right are, still their, please contact, worried! . . . . . marks seem to be burned in?
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in McAlester
There were no other sightings in McAlester on or around July 17th 2009
Summary: sky blacked out and loss of time and physical evidence
